definition: sends a firework display high into the sky, shoot up abruptly, like a rocket
details:
noun
- sends a firework display high into the sky
= synonyms: rocket
- propels bright light high in the sky, or used to propel a lifesaving line or harpoon
= synonyms: rocket
verb
- shoot up abruptly, like a rocket
= example: shoot up abruptly, like a rocket
= synonyms: rocket
